page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Workshops
page.description: Enhance your Serverless Knowledge by attending a workshop from one of our partners the day before the conference. You must have a ServerlessDays ticket to book a workshop. More details will be announced soon.

workshops.title: Remote debugging of live AWS Lambda functions
workshops.description: Learn how to use open source technology to add remote debugging to your favorite IDE for AWS Lambda.

workshops.title: Wild Rydes Serverless Web Application Workshop
workshops.description: In this workshop you'll deploy a simple web application that enables users to request unicorn rides from the Wild Rydes fleet.
workshops.location: DevOps Group, Floor 22, Capital Tower, Greyfriars Rd, Cardiff CF10 3AG

workshops.title: Serverless Monitoring and Troubleshooting with Lumigo
workshops.description: Hands on workshop led by Yan Cui, developer advocate at Lumigo. More details about the workshop will be provided soon.
workshops.location: Tramshed Tech (Board Room), Unit D, Pendyris St, Cardiff CF11 6BH
